string.name: Ques1
string.b: What makes this application better from others in the Market?

string.name: Ques2
string.b: How can I Contribute to make this app better ?

string.name: Ques3
string.b: Why do i get weird numbers with \'E\' between them ?

string.name: Ques4
string.b: I don\'t like the Advertisement, and i don\'t have money also. Is there any Good News for me ?

string.name: Ques5
string.b: I think that "blah..blah" Opertion is missing ?

string.name: Ques6
string.b: How can i contact You apart from github and mails ?

resources.string: The Application in itself is Unique, it has many features such as Dark Theme, etc.. which makes it different from others in the market. Moreover This is a Open Source Project, Hence Unique in itself

The Application is Open Source and the best thing about a OpenSource Projects are that, every individual who knows even a bit of Programming can contribute to make it better. Here is my Repository https://www.github.com/coder3101 I invite you to help me built it better for You.

The Number involving \'E\' is not Weird but is actually another way of representing bigger numbers in Scientific Notation. For Example if Your result is something like \"1.234568245E14\", it means 1.234568245 x 10^14.

Those Advertisements may annoy you, but they are a Source of Earning for me.. but fortuntely, i like talents and i hate if money comes in between you and your goals, So Guess What, You can still have the Paid Version of the App for free, but since nothing is actually free so you will have to do something, you will have to compile the complete application by your ownself, Clone the Project and cook it. Please Do not share your cooked Applications with others, let them compile their own..

Well i Just Included all the Operations which i know (still in Class 12 didn\'t studied more than this). If You think that Some Operations are Missing then Please Let me Know, I will try my best to include that in next versions of the app. (Yeah I will also get opportunity to learn new Operations also)
I mean that there are many ways to contact me, like you can reach to me on facebook here https://www.facebook.com/coder3101
Hey, its my birthday 31 January. Just a new way to let the World know, that i was born on this date.
